On-Line Searching of Computer Data Bases .A Prewitt, Barbara G. The Research Library of Rohm and Haas Company has been searching a variety of bibliographic data bases on-line for over one year.. A summary of our experiences and the merits of on-line searching is presented.. A conference call technique for driving a remote slave terminal is described.. .X 18	1	734 124	2	734 127	2	734 129	1	734 145	1	734 190	1	734 191	1	734 197	1	734 211	1	734 214	1	734 218	1	734 243	1	734 307	1	734 330	1	734 357	1	734 376	1	734 378	1	734 450	1	734 451	1	734 452	1	734 459	3	734 468	1	734 484	1	734 492	1	734 508	1	734 511	1	734 512	1	734 514	1	734 518	1	734 520	1	734 523	1	734 524	2	734 525	2	734 526	1	734 527	1	734 529	2	734 530	2	734 534	2	734 546	1	734 553	1	734 579	1	734 594	1	734 603	1	734 604	1	734 606	1	734 609	1	734 610	1	734 611	1	734 612	1	734 625	1	734 626	1	734 630	1	734 633	1	734 635	1	734 636	2	734 637	2	734 642	4	734 643	1	734 648	2	734 650	1	734 692	1	734 696	1	734 699	1	734 702	2	734 703	2	734 705	1	734 708	1	734 726	1	734 727	1	734 728	1	734 730	1	734 731	1	734 732	2	734 733	3	734 734	5	734 736	3	734 738	2	734 739	1	734 740	1	734 741	2	734 742	3	734 743	3	734 744	2	734 755	1	734 820	1	734 826	2	734 827	2	734 877	1	734 879	2	734 883	2	734 1004	1	734 1035	1	734 1078	1	734 1089	1	734 1091	1	734 1146	1	734 1207	1	734 1264	2	734 1297	1	734 1303	1	734 1356	1	734 1364	1	734 1368	1	734 1370	2	734 1372	2	734 1373	1	734 1374	3	734 1375	3	734 1376	2	734 1377	2	734 1383	1	734 1396	1	734 1448	1	734 1448	1	734
